1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Integer or string name.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Name.IntString
6 ( Name (..),
7   GetName (..),
8 ) where
9
10-- | String or integer name.
11data Name
12    = NameI Int
13    | NameS String 
14      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
15
16-- | Class for types which has name.
17class GetName a where
18    getName :: a -> Name
19
